meanings.definition: relating to the point in the orbit of the moon or a satellite at which it is farthest from the earth
meanings.sent1: The spacecraft reached its apogeal position, far away from Earth.
meanings.sent2: The moon's apogeal distance is fascinating to astronomers.
meanings.sent3: The alien joked that their spaceship was stuck in an apogeal parking spot.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared to an apogeal height, beyond anyone's expectations.
meanings.sent5: The apogeal view from the mountaintop took her breath away.
